Text.val: 27.07.2010 GB SCR15617 Added MlsTrans for parameters send via BCM011CLMSMQ37
-- If V.PERCDISP > V.PERC and V.DISPUTES > V.MIN the client is selected

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum (CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CLNT, :1/ADMN, :1/CMCD where CMCD_ADMNO = :2 and CMCD_CLNTNO = :3 and CLNT101_ADMNO = CMCD_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = CMCD_CLNTNO and CMCD_MARKCODE IN (select MARK_CODE from :1/MARK where MARK_CODEDISPUTE = 'Y') and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 1 and CLNT212_FCI = 0 and CLNT102_CLNTNO <> 99999 and (CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE is null or CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE > ':4') and CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and (YEAR(CLNT803_CONTRACTSTARTDATE) * 12 + MONTH (CLNT803_CONTRACTSTARTDATE)) <= :5 and exists (select * from :1/CLIENT CLNT where CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO and CLNT.CLNT402_ADVANCE > 0 and CLNT.CLNT407_FINANCECODE <> 'S') and ADMN_NO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_COUNTCREDITLIMITS = 'Y' and ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' for fetch only
